post:
We recently introduced Singapore and then made several improvements to the network by listening to customer feedback.

<br>

We also made similar improvements to our Hong Kong network.


<br>

If you see better networking performance from another provider in the same region, please contact us and provide the relevant traceroutes - and we will likely be able to provide similar or better performance.


Since we now operate out of 15 global locations (soon 16), we're also creating a separate support queue for network-related requests.

<br>

We have the following plans available until Monday's end in EST timezone.

<br>

<pre>
1 CPU core (12.5% dedicated, burstable up to 100%)
1 GB RAM
10 GB NVMe SSD
500 GB bandwidth
$20 per year
Pay for two years - get doubled RAM, storage, and bandwidth
https://manage.hosthatch.com/billing/order/sgp-1g
https://manage.hosthatch.com/billing/order/hkg-1g
</pre>

<br>

<pre>
2 CPU cores (50% dedicated, burstable up to 200%)
4 GB RAM
20 GB NVMe SSD
1 TB bandwidth
$35 per year
Pay for two years - get doubled RAM, storage, and bandwidth
https://manage.hosthatch.com/billing/order/sgp-4g
https://manage.hosthatch.com/billing/order/hkg-4g
</pre>

<br>

<pre>
3 CPU cores (100% dedicated, burstable up to 300%)
8 GB RAM
40 GB NVMe SSD
2 TB bandwidth
$65 per year
Pay for two years - get doubled RAM, storage, and bandwidth
https://manage.hosthatch.com/billing/order/sgp-8g
https://manage.hosthatch.com/billing/order/hkg-8g
</pre>

<br>

<pre>
1x 2.4+ GHz
512 MB RAM
500 GB disk
2 TB bandwidth
$20 per year
Pay for two years - get doubled RAM and bandwidth
https://manage.hosthatch.com/billing/order/lax-500g-special
</pre>

<br>

<pre>
1x 2.4+ GHz
1 GB RAM
2 TB disk
8 TB bandwidth
$55 per year
Pay for two years - get doubled RAM and bandwidth
https://manage.hosthatch.com/billing/order/lax-2tb-special
</pre>

<br>

Notes:

- These are available only for new orders, until Monday's end.
- Old servers cannot be switched to these plans.
- Setup time is 3 working days
- All orders are final, we do not provide refunds on these plans

<br>

Thank you for your continued support :)
